chunks.zh: [进送年卡，评论抽 100 永久] 一键拷贝网站指定区域代码，粘贴可用，快速起 mvp，还允许您将代码克隆为 JSX 或 Tailwind CSS 的组件
chunks.en: [Give away annual cards, comment to draw 100 permanent ones] One-click copy of website code for a specific area, paste and use, quick start of mvp, and also allows you to clone code into JSX or Tailwind CSS components

chunks.zh:
CopyCss 来了，刚过完年送一波福利，助力开发者快速产品 mvp ！！！ 这个浏览器插件使您能够从任何网站提取 CSS ，还允许您将代码克隆为 JSX 或 Tailwind CSS 的组件。

手动修改这个元素的 CSS 是一件麻烦的事。使用 CopyCss ，您只需点击即可获得它。毫不费力地设计您的完美页面。

您可以在任何网站上获取任何元素的代码，并将其快速复制为 HTML/JSX ，CSS/Tailwind CSS 或您选择的任何其他格式。

评论区留绿色软件抽 100 个永久激活码

年卡激活码免费送 v 友：8BF88AB1-407B-40B7-A335-89DFD0CAF2EB


官网地址 https://copycss.xyz

插件地址： https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/copycss-copy-css-scan-fro/gomkcikdgjioepmicndedpjppeamobhh?utm_source=ext_app_menu


功能使用展示：
![]( https://copycss.xyz/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fexport-codepen.48f59659.gif&w=1920&q=75)


![]( https://copycss.xyz/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fstyle-copy1.c1dcf6d8.gif&w=1920&q=75)
chunks.en:
CopyCss is here, giving out a wave of benefits after the New Year to help developers quickly product mvp!!! This browser plugin allows you to extract CSS from any website and also allows you to clone the code into JSX or Tailwind CSS components.

Manually modifying the CSS of this element is a hassle. With CopyCss, you can get it with just one click. Effortlessly design your perfect page.

You can get the code for any element on any website and quickly copy it as HTML/JSX, CSS/Tailwind CSS or any other format you choose.

Leave a green software comment to draw 100 permanent activation codes

Annual card activation code free for v friends: 8BF88AB1-407B-40B7-A335-89DFD0CAF2EB


Official website address https://copycss.xyz

Plugin address: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/copycss-copy-css-scan-fro/gomkcikdgjioepmicndedpjppeamobhh?utm_source=ext_app_menu


Functional use display:
![]( https://copycss.xyz/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fexport-codepen.48f59659.gif&w=1920&q=75)


![]( https://copycss.xyz/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fstyle-copy1.c1dcf6d8.gif&w=1920&q=75)

chunks.zh: 功能看着挺好，但是弹出框输入年卡激活码后再也没有出来了增强安全也关闭了，最好详细说明如何使用
chunks.en: The function looks good, but the pop-up box never came out again after entering the annual card activation code, enhanced security was also turned off, it is best to explain in detail how to use
It can actually be done like this, awesome

chunks.zh: 当个分子 试用了一下还蛮强大
chunks.en: Be a numerator. I tried it and it's quite powerful

chunks.zh: 不错不错，试了下，能用；复杂的效果有丢失
chunks.en: Not bad, I tried it, it works; complex effects are lost
